data.name: labelPhoto.Help
data.value: Add or select photo image for an employee.

data.name: labelUser.Help
data.value: Optional link to existing website user.

data.name: labelAcademicDegree.Help
data.value: Specify academic degree. This field is obsolete, you must specify employee's academic degrees on the Achievements tab.

data.name: labelAcademicTitle.Help
data.value: Specify academic title. This field is obsolete, you must specify employee's academic titles on the Achievements tab.

data.name: labelWebSiteLabel.Help
data.value: Optional label for personal website. If not specified, website URL will be used instead.

data.name: labelMessenger.Help
data.value: Enter instant messager kind and number.

data.name: labelWorkingHours.Help
data.value: Select employee's working hours (schedule) from a list

data.name: labelCustomWorkingHours.Help
data.value: Enter the employee's custom working hours (schedule) description.

data.name: labelWorkingPlace.Help
data.value: Enter emloyee's working place, e.g. office and cabinet number.

data.name: labelExperienceYearsBySpec.Help
data.value: Enter employee's working experience by speciality (years).

data.name: labelIsPublished.Help
data.value: Check to make employee record published.

data.name: labelUserLookup.Help
data.value: Enter user email address or username and press User Lookup to find users.

data.name: labelPositionTitleSuffix.Help
data.value: Specify a suffix to use along with the position title.

data.name: labelIsPrime.Help
data.value: If checked, this occupied position will be counted as prime for the employee.

data.name: labelAchievementTypes.Help
data.value: Select employee achievement type from the list.

data.name: labelYearBegin.Help
data.value: Enter starting year of the achievement. If not exists or not known, leave empty or set to -1.

data.name: labelYearEnd.Help
data.value: Enter final year of achievement. Set to 0 to specify ATM value; if not exists or not known, leave empty or set to -1.

data.name: labelAchievementTitle.Help
data.value: Enter the title for the described achievement.

data.name: labelAchievementShortTitle.Help
data.value: Enter the optional short title for the described achievement.

data.name: labelAchievementDescription.Help
data.value: Enter optional description to describe achievement.

data.name: labelAchievementTitleSuffix.Help
data.value: Enter the extension suffix for the achievement title.

data.name: labelIsTitle.Help
data.value: If checked, this achivement will be displayed as one of employee's titles along with his/her name.

data.name: labelDocumentURL.Help
data.value: Specify URL for a document, associated with the achievement.

data.name: labelAchievements.Help
data.value: Select the achievement from dropdown by title or select achivement type and set full and short titles manually.
